lead_paragraph: Fourth-seeded George Washington (25-10) rolled to an 87-71 victory at top-seeded Monmouth (28-8) on Monday night to advance to its first National Invitation Tournament quarterfinal.
snippet: Fourth-seeded George Washington (25-10) rolled to an 87-71 victory at top-seeded Monmouth (28-8) on Monday night to advance to its first National Invitation Tournament quarterfinal.
abstract: George Washington University defeats Monmouth University, 87-71, advancing to National Invitation Tournament quarterfinal; other college basketball news noted.
